letters.description: A comprehensive assessment of physical healing, mental health markers, and hormonal balance.
Facilitating the integration of the birth story and navigating the complex emotions of early motherhood.
Utilizing body-based techniques to regulate the nervous system and promote physical repair.
Coaching through the identity shifts and lifestyle changes inherent in the matrescence process.
Developing targeted dietary strategies to replenish depleted nutrient stores and support hormonal health.
Establishing a robust community framework and communication plan for the family unit.
Finalizing a sustainable self-care and growth plan for long-term maternal thriving and confidence.
